title: Kiss in the Wind
description: Looking back can seem daunting. Moving forward can seem impossible.  With an old friend back in her life, will Betty hold on to yesterday even if it tears her apart?  The past can’t be rewritten, but the world can be changed—especially if Betty and her family in Edenville have anything to do with it.  The Edenville Series: Book 1: Flowers in the Snow Book 2: Kiss in the Wind Book 3: Available Summer 2015
author: Danielle Stewart
